How to configure the automation device connection to your home internet network:\n

"1 - To start, restart the device by pressing the "RESET" button.

2 - After seeing the blue LED blink once, press and hold the "CONFIG" button until the LED stays on.

3 - Now, on your smartphone, connect to the Wi-Fi network called "LightFy" using the password "adminLFy1".

4 - Open the app and go to settings. Fill in the "Port" field with the number written underneath the device, then click the "Connect" button. The button will turn blue when the app connects to the device.

5 - Enter the name of your home Wi-Fi network and its password.

6 - To configure the IP fields:

	• In the "IP Address" field, use an available address on your local network.
	• Keep the "Subnet Mask" as 255.255.255.0.
	• In the "Default Gateway" field, enter your modem or router’s IP address.
	• Keep the "DNS" as 8.8.8.8.

If you have any doubts, it is advisable to seek help from an IT professional."
